videos.description: This slam from Bobby Portis was too nice

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (This slam from Bobby Portis was too nice) 2021/11/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: This slam from Bobby Portis was too nice

videos.description: Cade Cunningham struggles mightily from the field, going 2-for-14 and 0-for-9 from downtown as the Pistons suffer a blowout loss to the Bucks.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Cade Cunningham struggles again in his 2nd career game) 2021/11/02 ESHEET Sotfull
